name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-js-demo-time
title: Demo Time
shortDescription: The Demo Time web part enables presentation mode on any SharePoint page. It adds a `Play` button to the page header, allowing users to navigate through page sections as slides with `Previous`, `Next`, and `Stop` controls. Additionally, it supports custom comments for each section using a `Demo Time` list.
longDescription: The Demo Time web part enables presentation mode on any SharePoint page. It adds a `Play` button to the page header, allowing users to navigate through page sections as slides with `Previous`, `Next`, and `Stop` controls. Additionally, it supports custom comments for each section using a `Demo Time` list.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
